content.description:
Directions: Each of the questions or incomplete statements below is followed by four suggested answers or completions. Select the one that is best in each case.

The next questions refer to the 1932 German political poster below.

TRANSLATION:

“Women! Millions of men without work; millions of children without a future.

Save the German family—vote Adolf Hitler!”
content.question: The economic conditions portrayed in the poster are most directly a result of which of the following?

choices.label: The onset of the Great Depression
Hyperinflation after the First World War
The French occupation of the Rhineland
The abandonment of social welfare programs by the Weimar Republic

content.answer: The onset of the Great Depression

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
